name: Dinari BAC
description: The Dinari BAC dShares token (BAC.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Bank of America Corporation (BAC), one of the worldâ€™s largest financial institutions, providing banking, investment, and financial services. Each BAC.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding Bank of America share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. Leveraging blockchain technology, BAC.d offers fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, providing a modern and efficient way to access Bank of America shares.
